name: Project Skyward
description:
Project Skyward is a sandbox hentai RPG set in the fantasy realm of Mea'ternum.

Exploration is Key

Sprawling Dungeons, Puzzles, Romance Quests, Crafting, Mini Games and more await you. Gather your party and embark on this epic futanari adventure where you'll meet a wide array of creatures, villains, and heroes. From elegant Darkelf dancers to sunbathing Orcs; there's no shortage of those in need of help.

Factions & Rewards

Join the ranks of the Scarlet Tome and help spread Divinity through the land, or embrace destructive dark magic and quell those who would stand in your way. Befriend factions through side quests and currency collection to unlock more skills, equipment and hentai!

Futanari, Bikinis, and Games

Exhausted from your travels? The Palm Paw Resort just opened up to those with sufficient coin! Take a load off and enlist your companions in a match of Kiss Kiss Volleyball or try your luck at Slots, Coin Toss, or Star Cards. A perfect get-away for hard working adventurers.

A word from the developer...

Not enough lady-meat in your RPGs?

Project Skyward is a love-letter to classic JRPGs and the futanari fandom. It is a story about an air-headed futa adventurer who is thrust into a realm at war. As an aspiring hero, you'll be expected to rise and meet the coming threat. All the milk-maids and Elven MILFs are counting on you after all...

Unsheathe your blade!
Journey to slay the evil Demon Queen Eraanthe.
